title: Twinkle Nora Rock Me!
synopsis: Based on a 1980 manga by Mikuriya Satomi, this adaptation differs considerably from the original. The story started in its prequel was completed with this second OVA.
voices: ['Yamamoto, Yuriko', 'Nojima, Akio', 'Fujimoto, Yuzuru', 'Tanaka, Yasuo', 'Gouri, Daisuke', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Watabe, Takeshi']
staff: [['Mikuriya, Satomi', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Original Creator', ' Character Design']], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamakawa, Norio', ['Planning']], ['Shimokawa, Tadami', ['Art Director']]]
